name: The Kale Mary
description: The natural sweetness of grape tomatoes is a wonderful partner for kale juice in this Bloody Mary inspired non-alcoholic drink.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons (5 ounces) fresh tomato juice (from about 2 pints grape or cherry tomatoes, see note)
1/4 cup (2 ounces) fresh kale juice (from about 1/2 pound kale)
2 tablespoons (1 ounce) fresh celery juice (from 4 ribs celery)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix horseradish and soy sauce in a glass. Add tomato juice and stir well until horseradish is well distributed. Add kale juice, celery juice, lemon juice, and hot sauce. Stir well. Serve with celery rib garnish, over ice if desired.
